human.title: Human Cost
human.description: Armed conflicts cause immense human suffering and destroy communities. Every person deserves to live without fear of violence.

resources.title: Better Use of Resources
resources.description: Resources currently used for conflict could instead support education, healthcare, scientific research, and solving global challenges.

collaboration.title: Working Together
collaboration.description: Humanity faces challenges that require global cooperation. From climate change to space exploration, our future depends on working together.
